resourceTemplates.name: office365-active-user-counts-period
resourceTemplates.title: Office 365 active user counts by period
resourceTemplates.description: Gets active user counts for Office 365 services over a specified period (D7, D30, D90, D180).

resourceTemplates.name: teams-user-activity-counts-period
resourceTemplates.title: Teams user activity counts by period
resourceTemplates.description: Gets Teams user activity counts over a specified period (D7, D30, D90, D180).

resourceTemplates.name: teams-user-activity-user-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Teams user activity user detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets per-user detail of Teams user activity for a specified period.

resourceTemplates.name: aad-signins
resourceTemplates.title: Azure AD sign-ins
resourceTemplates.description: Lists recent sign-in events (requires appropriate permissions).

resourceTemplates.name: mailbox-usage-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Mailbox usage detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets per-user mailbox usage detail for a specified period.

resourceTemplates.name: onedrive-usage-account-detail
resourceTemplates.title: OneDrive usage account detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets per-user OneDrive usage account detail for a specified period.

resourceTemplates.name: sharepoint-site-usage-detail
resourceTemplates.title: SharePoint site usage detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets usage detail for SharePoint sites for a specified period.

resourceTemplates.name: aad-user-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Azure AD user detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets user sign-in and license detail for a specified period.

resourceTemplates.name: m365-app-user-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Microsoft 365 app user detail
resourceTemplates.description: Gets per-user Microsoft 365 app usage detail for a specified period.
